title: Market Behavior and Active Inference
description: Application of Active Inference to understanding market behavior, price formation, and agent interactions in financial markets.
learning_objectives: Model market participants as Active Inference agents
Understand price formation through belief updating
Apply Active Inference to market dynamics
Design market mechanisms using Active Inference principles

content.overview: Active Inference provides a framework for modeling market behavior where agents continuously update their beliefs about market conditions and make trading decisions to minimize expected free energy. This leads to emergent market dynamics and price discovery.

market_dynamics.bubbles_and_crashes: Collective belief dynamics leading to market extremes
